comments:
If I create a new make target, and give it a name (newtarget) but leave the
build target field blank (to make it possible to just run make, and use the
default target), everything seems to work fine until I restart eclipse. Once I
restart eclipse, if I open the Build Make Targets dialog there is an empty line
at the top and if I try to edit the newtarget make target I get an
IllegalArgumentException:
